title: Universal Threshold Field v1.0.1 — Wei Bridge Alignment
description: The UTF programme aligns Jason Wei's emergent ability lanterns with the universal threshold quartet (R, Θ, β, ζ(R)). This release packages analysis/llm_beta_extractor.py, docs/wei_integration.md, and paper/manuscript_v1.0.tex updates so ΔAIC diagnostics, canonical β bands, and symbolic narratives cohere for DOI minting.
notes: ΔAIC ≥ 10.18 guards the Wei bridge; canonical β band [3.6, 4.8] accompanies the release.
